name: WebGLActiveInfo
description: The WebGLActiveInfo interface is part of the WebGL API and represents the information returned by calling the WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveAttrib() and WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveUniform() methods.

members.name: WebGLActiveInfo.name
members.description: The read-only name of the requested variable.

members.name: WebGLActiveInfo.size
members.description: The read-only size of the requested variable.

members.name: WebGLActiveInfo.type
members.description: The read-only type of the requested variable.
